attributes.action: make emergency brain surgery avaliable to all when required
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: emergency health care (brain surgery)  needs to be avaliable 24hrs a day 7 days a week. without this cover people are dying.

rejection.details: Please re-submit this petition, explaining clearly and precisely what it is you are requesting.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
